articles.title: Congratulations to Guinean Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Guinean Prime Minister
						
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Oct. 17 sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Said Fofana on his reappointment as prime minister of the Republic of Guinea.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the stability and development of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger.
